Portfolio
Many open-source data are available via governments, organisations, companies, etc data platform. I selected some datasets from various sources and various domains and performed data analysis and visualisation. I am many using Python as programming language and only open-source tools/libraries. Some of my projects can be found below as example of data analysis.
Students Performance Analysis
Analysis and visualisation of students performance.
Tools: Kaggle notebook, Python, Plotly, PCA
Significant Earthquake
Analysis and visualisation of world's significant earthquake.
Tools: Kaggle notebook, Python, Plotly, PCA
Forecast Electricity Generation (UK)
Forecast the electricity generation in the UK using machine learning.
Tools: Colab, Python, Plotly, HTML
Public Cycle Hire (Rennes, Vélo Star)
Analysis and visualisation of the public cycle hire service in Rennes (France).
Tools: Python, Bokeh, Plotly, HTML
Underground Service (Rennes)
Analysis and visualisation of the underground service in Rennes (France).
Tools: Python, Bokeh
Maddison World Economy
Visualisation of world economy data using Maddison project data.
Tools: Python, Plotly, HTML
Population Ille-et-Vilaine (French Department)
Analysis and visualisation of the population of the French department Ille-et-Vilaine.
Tools: Python, Bokeh, MongoDB
Electric Vehicle Charging Station (Rennes)
Analysis and localisation of electric vehicle charging stations around Rennes (France).
Tools: Python, Tableau
French Population
Visualisation of French population per department from 1968 to 2015.
Tools: Python, Tableau
